name: Azurill
author: Asako Ito
flavor_text: A Pokémon that lives by water. It moves quickly on land by bouncing on its big tail.

abilities.name: Growing Up
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, attach a basic Energy card from your discard pile to your Active Pokémon. If you use this Ability, your turn ends.
